Access to the API.The API uses keys to authenticate reques: Every request must be accompanied by the apikey parameter and an API key

endpoints.name: Objects
endpoints.description: Retrieve data about individual artworks, including images and details.

endpoints.name: Galleries
endpoints.description: Access data about gallery spaces and the artworks in them.

endpoints.name: Publications
endpoints.description: Fetch details on publications by the museum.

endpoints.name: People
endpoints.description: Retrieve data about artists, donors, and related individuals.
